artist: Artist: Julie Buffalohead; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, The Friends of Bruce B. Dayton Acquisition Fund and the Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: Lithograph printed from six plates in brown, red, and black depicting a laying deer, a bird on its back in a costume, and a groundhog holding two shadow puppets. Printing order: brown, black, and red.

medium: Color lithograph on kozo shi paper
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2020.
signed: LRC in pencil: Julie Buffalohead 2014 | BC in pencil: ENTWINED
title: Entwined
